QuestData.Title: Standards and Practices
QuestData.Description: If you're venturing into the Burning Blade Ruins, I have a task for you. Take these Mag'har battle standards and place them at three distinct locations in the ogre compound. An area of high visibility is recommended. Look for the gigantic flaming pyres on the upper levels. Place a standard near the first, second, and third Burning Blade pyres.$B$BThe standard will leave a lasting impression upon any ogres who may have missed the battle.
QuestData.LogDescription: Elkay'gan the Mystic at Garadar in Nagrand wants you to use the Mag'har Battle Standard at the First Burning Blade Pyre, Second Burning Blade Pyre, and Third Burning Blade Pyre. Return the left-over Mag'har Battle Standards to him when you are finished.
QuestData.CompletionText: Respect from fear! It is as good as any other kind.
QuestData.RewardText: Perhaps you would like another task? A more delicate matter, eh?
